page.title: 13SUPERSTORE
page.content: Fine Fare Superstore, Aberdeen The Fine Fare company was founded over 1 hundred years ago, but the actua; store has been there for only 20 years. The store sells fresh food, garden products, fancy cakes. Business is always good especially on Fridays and Saturdays. The General manager is James Wildgoose with an assistant manager and various department heads. Altogether there are 28 employees. Fine Fare at the Bridge of Dee is not the only store owned by the company in the area. More middle aged people go to Fine Fare than anyone else. There are no more plans for the future development of the store itself. There is another Fine Fare superstore at the Bridge of Don.
